plot: The continuing adventures of Nozomu Itoshiki as despair and his class of eccentric students continues to stalk him.
title: Zan sayonara zetsubô sensei bangai-chi
plot_es: The continuing adventures of Nozomu Itoshiki as despair and his class of eccentric students continues to stalk him.
plot_en: The continuing adventures of Nozomu Itoshiki as despair and his class of eccentric students continues to stalk him.
